prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Organ, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Bass, omitting Brass.

Style 3:
No Brass is included in this song, which is made up of Organ, Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Bass.
